title: integrative medicine Archives - Healthy Balance
cleaned_text: Anxiety and Insomnia](https://blog.uvahealth.com/2018/08/03/sleepless-tween/) Helping a sleepless tween figure out to manage stress, anxiety, and insomnia isn't easy. So I took my kid to see Dr. Way, who gave her a yoga prescription. My daughter learned to meditate, stretch, and take care of her worried thoughts. And now we're both less stressed. This is a story every parent should read.
